GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: Fix a NULL pointer dereference in amdgpu_dm_connector_add_common_modes()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit f4eaa999fec78dec2a9c2d797438e05cbffb125b, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit e7b07ceef2a650e5ed8ca37997689e086c680daf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/amd/display: Fix a NULL pointer dereference in amdgpu_dm_connector_add_common_modes()
